channel.title: Quest for breakfast
channel.description: Recent content on Quest for breakfast

item.title: About
item.description: Rhian and James review the vegetarian breakfasts available from cafes in cycling distance of Lancaster. The map below shows all the cafes we would like to visit or have visited so far.

item.title: Ireby Green Farm
item.description: Ireby Green Farm The night before we had been celebrating our friends 10 year engagement party. Yes that’s right ten years! To ride off the hangover we set off early and headed to Ireby in hunt of second breakfast. Our route is on Strava. Rating:
